abstract: Two top Bear Stearns investment bankers are opening an advisory boutique and plan to split with JPMorgan Chase the fee they expect to earn on a $5.2 billion buyout deal, according to TheStreet.com.
lead_paragraph: Two top Bear Stearns investment bankers are opening an advisory boutique and plan to split with JPMorgan Chase the fee they expect to earn on a $5.2 billion buyout deal, according to TheStreet.com.

headline.main: 2 Bear Bankers to Hang Their Own Shingle
